ygData.subject: Re: I'm new here.
ygData.msgSnippet: It gives new meaning to hitting them so hard that ┬á they don t know which way to turn... ┬á Sylly. ... From: Kimes, Dean W.
ygData.messageBody:
It gives new meaning to hitting them so hard that
´┐¢
'they don't know which way to turn..."
´┐¢
Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 12:16 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] I'm new here.



Nothing like adventuring with 3 rogues though and midway thru the fight
suddenly having all the critters doin the curly shuffle (You know, 'Hey that
bard hurt me', turn to Kitasi, rogue backstabs Legionnaire for 30, 'Hey that
rogue hurt me', turn to rogue, Pulse, 'Hey that bard hurt me', etc...)´┐¢ Its
a hoot!

´┐¢
